seniority_level.evidence: Job requires minimum 5 years (and 6 years on Databricks) of experience, which aligns with senior-level expectations.

job_family.evidence: Title is Data Engineer and responsibilities focus on building and maintaining data pipelines.

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions real-time streaming pipelines, Kafka, and event-driven processing alongside batch ETL.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people‑management duties or direct reports; role is purely technical.

primary_cloud.evidence: Explicitly lists AWS, Azure, and GCP as platforms for data engineering workflows.

secondary_clouds.evidence: All three clouds are treated equally; no single secondary provider identified.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Job description includes both real‑time streaming (Kafka) and batch processing (ETL/ELT).

orchestrator_category.evidence: Apache Airflow is explicitly mentioned as a data orchestration tool.

storage_layer.evidence: References to S3/Blob Storage (data lake) and Redshift/BigQuery (data warehouse).

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is given as Bengaluru, India, but no remote or on‑site restriction is stated.

timezone_focus.evidence: No timezone or regional focus is described in the posting.

relocation_required.evidence: Posting does not mention any relocation requirement.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is not mentioned in the posting.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No reference to OPT/CPT eligibility is provided.

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work‑authorization restrictions are stated.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type (W2, C2C, 1099) is not specified.

benefits_level.evidence: The posting lists no benefits such as health, PTO, equity, or learning budget.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No discussion of career ladders, promotion tracks, or growth pathways.

mentorship_signals.evidence: Role involves collaborating with Integration Architects and Data Architects, implying exposure to senior staff.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotion or advancement opportunities.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No reference to internal transfers or mobility programs.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) are described.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Long list of mandatory hard skills with only a few nice‑to‑have items.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description is focused specifically on data engineering responsibilities.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Required skill set aligns with a senior data engineer having 5‑6 years of experience.
